title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Nick Wright on AB's Meltdown, Dak vs. Kyler, Costly Chiefs L
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Nick Wright on AB's Meltdown, Dak vs. Kyler, Costly Chiefs L
description:
Colin reacts to Antonio Brown's tantrum and sudden departure from the Buccaneers (3:00). Then, First Things First co-host Nick Wright joins Colin to discuss Joe Burrow and Ja'Marr Chase's powerhouse performance against the Chiefs (8:00), why it was a "costly" loss for Kansas City (11:00), why Dak is getting passed by several younger QB's (14:00), their reaction to Antonio Brown's tantrum (27:00), comparing AB's fall from grace to Odell Beckham Jr's comeback (32:00), and if the Warriors are the clear NBA title favorite (41:00).

Make sure to Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
